file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-79-06 - CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER CABIN LH/RH SIDES - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER CABIN LH/RH SIDES - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of center fuselage I - passenger cabin LH/RH sides for general condition. B. Related Zones: 231/232. C. Zone Boundaries: STA X = 4154.5 thru STA X = 7131.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER- CABIN-WINDOWS AERODYNAMIC SEAL- ALL 05-20-79-200-802-A ING- EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL IN- SPECTION CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER ALL 05-20-79-200-803-A ♦ CABIN LH/RH SIDES - EXTERNAL GEN- ERAL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-79 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-79-200-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER-CABIN-WINDOWS AERODYNAMIC SEALING- EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of center fuselage I, at zones 231/232, within a touching distance of the items examined. (2) The function of the external general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 56-20-01-100-801-A/700 PASSENGER CABIN WINDOWS - CLEANING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Center fuselage I - passenger cabin win- 1 Does the task dows I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) If necessary, clean the inspection area ( AMM TASK 56-20-01-100-801-A/700) and (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 05-20-79 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Make sure that the passenger-cabin-window aerodynamic sealing is not scratched, scored, cracked, or ruptured (Figure 601). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 05-20-79 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Center Fuselage I - Passenger-Cabin-Window Aerodynamic Sealing- External General Visual Inspection Figure 601 ZONES 231/232 241/242 251/252 261/262 A B DET. A 1 AERODYNAMIC SEALING DET. B 1 EXTERNALLY INSPECT THE AERODYNAMIC SEALING. EM145AMM050973A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 05-20-79 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-79-200-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER CABIN LH/RH SIDES - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 53-Z231-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of center fuselage I, at zones 231/232, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING PASSENGER CABIN WINDOWS - INSPECTION/ AMM TASK 56-20-01-200-801-A/600 CHECK C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Center fuselage I - passenger cabin 1 Does the task LH/RH sides I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Put the ladder in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-803-A/600 05-20-79 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 602) SUBTASK 212-003-A (1) Examine the fuselage zone for painting bad condition, loose rivets, skin deformation, fillet sealant condition, nicks, cracks, scratches, gouges, creases, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment. (2) Examine the fuselage skin panel at stringers and frames/bulkheads for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 602). (3) Examine the fuselage skin longitudinal and circumferential splice for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 602). (4) Examine the passenger cabin windows frames for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 602). (5) Examine the passenger cabin windows for delaminations and crazing ( AMM TASK 56-20-01-200-801-A/600). (6) Examine the passenger door cutout structure (Figure 602). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-803-A/600 05-20-79 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Center Fuselage I - Passenger Cabin LH/RH Sides - External General Visual Inspection Figure 602 ZONES 231 232 A 1 2 DET. A 1 EXTERNALLY INSPECT THE FUSELAGE SKIN PANEL AT STRINGER, FRAMES/BULKHEADS, SKIN LONGITUDINAL AND CIRCUMFERENTIAL SPLICES. 2 EXTERNALLY INSPECT THE PASSENGER DOOR CUTOUT STRUCTURE 145AMM050274.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-803-A/600 05-20-79 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
